text: Anwar Hossain Howlader is a Jatiya Party (Ershad) politician and the former Member of Parliament of Patuakhali-3. ==Career== Howlader was elected to parliament from Patuakhali-3 as a Jatiya Party candidate in 1986. ==References== Category:Jatiya Party politicians Category:Living people Category:3rd Jatiya Sangsad members Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Anwar Hossain Howlader
